snippet: Enterovirus 68 has been found in at least four people who died, and has caused an influx of sick children at hospitals nationwide.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announces that at least four people carrying the enterovirus 68 virus have died, but is is unclear to what extent the virus contributed to their deaths; enterovirus 68 has sickened people in more than 40 states.
lead_paragraph: Enterovirus 68 has been found in at least four people who died, and has caused an influx of sick children at hospitals nationwide.

headline.main: Enterovirus 68 Respiratory Illness Is Linked to Four Deaths
headline.print_headline: Four Deaths Are Linked to a Respiratory Illness

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
